texto:
This community is intended as an exclusive space for all those related to food and beverages in all its links in the production chain:

 -Raw Materiales Producers

 -Production

 -Manufacturing

 -Services

 -Logistic and Transport

 -And many others interested...

We offer representation services and personalized treatment to our members, at a very low cost and achieving a very efficient source of promotion for their products and / or services. Please Join NOW!

Once the member logs in, enter the main dashboard. In the center are the links to the main functionalities and loaded databases of Foobe.

Main features:

Professional Profile setup

Contact search and lists

Finantial information

Tradeshows Foobe's calendar

Collected data from Tradeshows

Displaying the sidebar of the Foobe app you will find all the functionalities and information of this platform.

Contact, financial and general information search tools, they are all detailed right there and very easy to access.

The Foobe's community member can enter their professional contact details to be found by other members of the platform. In this way they can contact each other and be ordered in a contact list.

The profile settings are subdivided into:

-Account data (name, anniversary, tagline profile, photo)

-Social Networks (Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram)

-Job Details

-Summary

This functionality can be found in the top right corner clicking the wheel icon.
